00037     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     String convertPath( const String &init)
00039     {
00040         // Internal method for standardising paths
00041         // Use forward slashes only, end with slash
00042         String path = init;
00043 
00044         std::replace( path.begin(), path.end(), '\\', '/' );
00045         if( path[path.length() - 1] != '/' )
00046             path += '/';
00047 
00048         return path;
00049         /*
00050 
00051         int pos;
00052 
00053         pos = path.find("\\",0);
00054         while (pos != -1)
00055         {
00056             // Replace bckslash with forward slash
00057             path.at(pos) = '/';
00058             pos = path.find("\\",pos);
00059         }
00060 
00061         if (path.at(path.length()-1) != '/')
00062         {
00063             // Make sure finishes with slash
00064             path += "/";
00065 
00066         }
00067         */
00068     }

00070     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00071     ResourceManager::ResourceManager()
00072     {
00073         // Init memory limit & usage
00074         mMemoryBudget = std::numeric_limits<unsigned long>::max();
00075         mMemoryUsage = 0;
00076 
00077     }
00078 
00079     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     ResourceManager::~ResourceManager()
00081     {
00082         this->unloadAndDestroyAll();
00083     }
00084 
00085     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00086     void ResourceManager::load(Resource *res, int priority)
00087     {
00088         res->load();
00089         res->touch();
00090 
00091         mResources[res->getName()] = res; //.insert(res->getName(), res);
00092     }
00093 
00094     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00095     void ResourceManager::setMemoryBudget(unsigned long bytes)
00096     {
00097         // Update limit & check usage
00098         mMemoryBudget = bytes;
00099         checkUsage();
00100     }
00101 
00102     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     void ResourceManager::unload(Resource* res)
00104     {
00105         // Unload resource
00106         res->unload();
00107 
00108         // Erase entry in map
00109         mResources.erase(res->getName());
00110 
00111         // Update memory usage
00112         mMemoryUsage -= res->getSize();
00113 
00114         // Note that we DON'T destroy Resource object
00115     }
00116 
00117     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00118     void ResourceManager::unloadAndDestroyAll()
00119     {
00120         // Unload & delete resources in turn
00121         for(
00122             ResourceMap::iterator it = mResources.begin();
00123             it != mResources.end();
00124             ++it)
00125         {
00126             it->second->unload();
00127             delete it->second;
00128         }
00129 
00130         // Empty the list
00131         mResources.clear();
00132     }
00133     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00134     Resource* ResourceManager::getByName(const String& name)
00135     {
00136         ResourceMap::iterator it = mResources.find(name);
00137 
00138         if( it == mResources.end() )
00139             return 0;
00140         else
00141             return it->second;
00142     }

00146     {
00147         // Page out here?
00148     }

00150     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00151     void ResourceManager::addSearchPath( const String& path)
00152     {
00153         addArchiveEx( convertPath(path), "FileSystem" );
00154     }
00155 
00156     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00157     void ResourceManager::addCommonSearchPath( const String& path)
00158     {
00159         addCommonArchiveEx( convertPath(path), "FileSystem" );
00160     }
00161 
00162     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00163     void ResourceManager::addArchiveEx( const String& strName, const String& strDriverName )
00164     {
00165         ArchiveEx* pArch = ArchiveManager::getSingleton().load( strName, strDriverName );
00166 
00167         StringVector vec = pArch->getAllNamesLike( "", "" );
00168         for( StringVector::iterator it = vec.begin(); it != vec.end(); ++it )
00169             mArchiveFiles[(*it)] = pArch;
00170 
00171         mVFS.push_back(pArch);
00172     }
00173 
00174     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00175     void ResourceManager::addCommonArchiveEx( const String& strName, const String& strDriverName )
00176     {
00177         ArchiveEx* pArch = ArchiveManager::getSingleton().load( strName, strDriverName );
00178 
00179         StringVector vec = pArch->getAllNamesLike( "", "" );
00180         for( StringVector::iterator it = vec.begin(); it != vec.end(); ++it )
00181             mCommonArchiveFiles[(*it)] = pArch;
00182 
00183         mCommonVFS.push_back(pArch);
00184     }
00185 
00186     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00187     bool ResourceManager::_findResourceData(
00188         const String& filename,
00189         DataChunk& refChunk )
00190     {
00191         DataChunk* pChunk = &refChunk;
00192         // Search file cache first
00193         // NB don't treat this as definitive, incase ArchiveEx can't list all existing files
00194         FileMap::const_iterator it;
00195         if( ( it = mArchiveFiles.find( filename ) ) != mArchiveFiles.end() )
00196             return it->second->fileRead( filename, &pChunk );
00197         if( ( it = mCommonArchiveFiles.find( filename ) ) != mCommonArchiveFiles.end() )
00198             return it->second->fileRead( filename, &pChunk );
00199 
00200         // Not found in cache
00201         // Look for it the hard way
00202         std::vector<ArchiveEx*>::iterator j; 
00203         // Search archives specific to this resource type
00204         for(j = mVFS.begin(); j != mVFS.end(); ++j )
00205         {
00206             if( *j && (*j)->fileTest(filename) )
00207             {
00208                 return (*j)->fileRead( filename, &pChunk );
00209             }
00210         }
00211         // Search common archives
00212         for(j = mCommonVFS.begin(); j != mCommonVFS.end(); ++j )                 
00213         {
00214             if( *j && (*j)->fileTest(filename) )
00215             {
00216                 return (*j)->fileRead( filename, &pChunk );
00217             }
00218         }
00219         
00220         // Not found
00221         Except(
00222             Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND,
00223             "Resource " + filename + " not found.",
00224             "ResourceManager::_findResourceData" );
00225 
00226         // To keep compiler happy
00227         return false;
00228     }
00229     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00230     std::set<String> ResourceManager::_getAllCommonNamesLike( const String& startPath, const String& extension )
00231     {
00232         std::vector<ArchiveEx*>::iterator i;
00233         StringVector vecFiles;
00234         std::set<String> retFiles;
00235 
00236         // search common archives
00237         for (i = mCommonVFS.begin(); i != mCommonVFS.end(); ++i)
00238         {
00239             vecFiles = (*i)->getAllNamesLike( "./", extension);
00240             for (StringVector::iterator si = vecFiles.begin(); si != vecFiles.end(); ++si)
00241             {
00242                 retFiles.insert(*si);
00243             }
00244         }
00245 
00246         return retFiles;
00247     }
00248     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00249     bool ResourceManager::_findCommonResourceData( const String& filename, DataChunk& refChunk )
00250     {
00251         DataChunk* pChunk = &refChunk;
00252         // Search file cache first
00253         // NB don't treat this as definitive, incase ArchiveEx can't list all existing files
00254         FileMap::const_iterator it;
00255         if( ( it = mCommonArchiveFiles.find( filename ) ) != mCommonArchiveFiles.end() )
00256             return it->second->fileRead( filename, &pChunk );
00257 
00258         // Not found in cache
00259         // Look for it the hard way
00260         std::vector<ArchiveEx*>::iterator j; 
00261         // Search common archives
00262         for(j = mCommonVFS.begin(); j != mCommonVFS.end(); ++j )                 
00263         {
00264             if( *j && (*j)->fileTest(filename) )
00265             {
00266                 return (*j)->fileRead( filename, &pChunk );
00267             }
00268         }
00269         
00270         // Not found
00271         Except(
00272             Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND,
00273             "Resource " + filename + " not found.",
00274             "ResourceManager::_findCommonResourceData" );
00275 
00276         // To keep compiler happy
00277         return false;
00278     }
